extendedInfo.description: Trip Budget Calculator is a tool that helps you to calculate an estimated cost of your trip on the road.Are you going to travel by car, bike or van? Trip Budget can tell you how much you will spend and differentiates between fuel, food and night costs.You simply have to specify the characteristics of your vehicle and the average of food and night costs per day. Once you have personalize this information, this will be saved in your phone and will be recalled every time you need it. You just introduce the total kms of your current trip and you will get an estimated budget. So easy.From now on, when you are talking with your friends about a possible trip on the road, you can calculate its estimated cost in just a few seconds!The application includes a help function to calculate the consumption of your vehicle in liter/100km.Languages supported by this application:- English (default)- German- Spanish- CatalanTested in the following devices:- Samsung Galaxy S2 (4.0.4 & 4.2.1)- Samsung Galaxy Plus One (2.3.3)- Nexus One (2.3.7)- Nexus 4 (4.2.1)- Nexus 7 (4.2.1)- Nexus 10 (4.2.1)Permissions used by the application:- Network communication: Google AdvertisementChange log:Version 1.0.3- the application can be installed on the SD card.- the currency (Euro, Dollar, ...) can be set by the user.- the unit of measuring length (kilometers, miles) can be assigned by the user.- the unit of measuring volume (liters, gallons) can be determined by the user.Note: no currency, length and volume conversions are carried out.version 1.0.2- Lets the user to set zero as food cost and sleep cost.- Now is optional to count the food cost for trips shorter than one day, via user settings.- Several UI fixes.- Several internal optimizations.version 1.0.1- Solves crashings when performing calculations with zero or empty fields.

reviews.title: Simple, ligera y \303\272til, muy \303\272til
reviews.comment: Se trata del complemento ideal a Google Maps y Google Navigator a la hora de planificar un viaje.  Se trata de una aplicaci\303\263n que siempre es \303\272til tener en tu dispositivo Android. Es gratis y ocupa muy poco espacio (menos de 200Kb).  Cuando la ejecutas, la mem\303\263ria de tu m\303\263vil ni se entera con lo que fluye super r\303\241pida incluso en los Android 2.3.3.  El pasado fin de semana fui con unos amigos a la monta\303\261a en coche y nos fue ideal para poder valorar el  precio del viaje y repartir gastos.  La posibilidad de poder configurarla seg\303\272n tus gustos la hacen, si cabe, m\303\241s pr\303\241ctica.  Un ejemplo m\303\241s de ideas simples que facilitan tu vida.
reviews.author: Sergio Ambel

reviews.title: This calculator is awesome
reviews.comment: Put the costs of my road trip in plain sight, so I know how to manage my expenses
reviews.author: diane diane

reviews.title: Justo lo que buscaba
reviews.comment: Muy buena idea, te ayuda un mont\303\263n a la hora de planificar viajes o rutas, sabiendo de antemano lo que te va a costar.  Genial aplicaci\303\263n y gratis!
reviews.author: Mario P\303\251rez

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Very good to have a rough estimate of your trip cost. Perfect for motorbikes multi-days journeys.
reviews.author: Bruno Su\303\241rez Laffargue

reviews.title: Simple and useful
reviews.comment: Very easy to use and gives you an idea of your car/motorbike trip at a glance
reviews.author: Zolt\303\241n T\303\263th-Czifra
